document.title: Health Education Content Standards for California Public Schools, Kindergarten Through Grade Twelve

F8B7CBE0DFE3013190ED68A86D17958E.description: Demonstrate the ability to support other students who have chronic diseases and conditions (e.g., asthma, allergies, diabetes, and epilepsy).

F8B78580DFE3013190EC68A86D17958E.description: Educate family and peers to protect against skin damage from the sun.

F8B73520DFE3013190EB68A86D17958E.description: Health Promotion - All students will demonstrate the ability to promote and support personal, family, and community health.
comments: Personal, family, and community health are interdependent and mutually supporting. The ability to promote the health of oneself and others reflects a well-rounded development and expression of health.

F8B6F2C0DFE3013190EA68A86D17958E.description: Demonstrate appropriate behaviors during fire drills, earthquake drills, and other disaster drills.

F8B6B350DFE3013190E968A86D17958E.description: Demonstrate proper ways of protecting oneself from the sun and ways to select and apply sunscreen.

F8B672B0DFE3013190E868A86D17958E.description: Demonstrate techniques for preventing disease transmission (e.g., covering sneezes and coughs, frequent handwashing).

F8B62FF0DFE3013190E768A86D17958E.description: Demonstrate proper toothbrushing and flossing techniques.

F8B5E4F0DFE3013190E668A86D17958E.description: Practicing Health-Enhancing Behaviors - All students will demonstrate the ability to practice behaviors that reduce risk and promote health.
comments: Practicing healthy behaviors builds competence and confidence to use learned skills in real-life situations. The ability to adopt health-enhancing behaviors demonstrates students' ability to use knowledge and skills to manage health and reduce risk-taking behaviors.

F8B59530DFE3013190E568A86D17958E.description: Make a plan to practice dental and personal hygiene.

F8B54C90DFE3013190E468A86D17958E.description: Goal Setting - All students will demonstrate the ability to use goal-setting skills to enhance health.
comments: The desire to pursue health is an essential component of building healthy habits. The ability to use goal-setting skills enables students to translate health knowledge into personally meaningful health behaviors.

F8B4FF60DFE3013190E368A86D17958E.description: Use a decision-making process to evaluate how personal hygiene behaviors promote one's health.

F8B4AE20DFE3013190E268A86D17958E.description: Decision Making - All students will demonstrate the ability to use decision-making skills to enhance health.
comments: Managing health behaviors requires critical thinking and problem solving. The ability to use decision-making skills to guide health behaviors fosters a sense of control and promotes the acceptance of personal responsibility.

F8B45D70DFE3013190E168A86D17958E.description: Demonstrate effective communication skills in an emergency situation.

F8B41110DFE3013190E068A86D17958E.description: Demonstrate effective communication skills when asking for assistance with health-related problems.

F8B39BF0DFE3013190DF68A86D17958E.description: Interpersonal Communication - All students will demonstrate the ability to use interpersonal communication skills to enhance health.
comments: Positive relationships support the development of healthy attitudes and behaviors. The ability to appropriately convey and receive information, beliefs, and emotions is a skill that enables students to manage risk, conflict, and differences and to promote health.

F8B345D0DFE3013190DE68A86D17958E.description: Explain why parents or guardians keep a health record for their child.

F8B30090DFE3013190DD68A86D17958E.description: Identify individuals in the school and in the community who promote health.

F8B29600DFE3013190DC68A86D17958E.description: Accessing Valid Information - All students will demonstrate the ability to access and analyze health information, products, and services.
comments: Students are exposed to numerous sources of information, products, and services. The ability to access and analyze health information, products, and services provides a foundation for practicing health-enhancing behaviors. Health choices are affected by a variety of influences. The ability to recognize, analyze, and evaluate internal and external influences is essential to protecting and enhancing health.

F8B24D30DFE3013190DB68A86D17958E.description: Explain how family and friends influence positive health practices.

F8B20100DFE3013190DA68A86D17958E.description: Analyzing Influences - All students will demonstrate the ability to analyze internal and external influences that affect health.
comments: Health choices are affected by a variety of influences. The ability to recognize, analyze, and evaluate internal and external influences is essential to protecting and enhancing health.

F8B1BA80DFE3013190D968A86D17958E.description: Identify emergency situations (e.g., injuries, abductions, fires, floods, earthquakes).

F8B17A00DFE3013190D868A86D17958E.description: Identify materials that can be reduced, reused, or recycled.

F8B137F0DFE3013190D768A86D17958E.description: Discuss how individual behavior affects the environment and community.

F8B0F460DFE3013190D668A86D17958E.description: Explain the difference between communicable diseases and noncommunicable diseases.

F8B0B0D0DFE3013190D568A86D17958E.description: Describe symptoms of some common health problems and illnesses, including chronic diseases (e.g., asthma, allergies, diabetes, influenza).

F8B06560DFE3013190D468A86D17958E.description: Identify ways to prevent the transmission of communicable diseases.

F8B021F0DFE3013190D368A86D17958E.description: Discuss the importance of preventing the transmission of germs.

F8AFD3D0DFE3013190D268A86D17958E.description: Identify the importance of sun safety.

F8AF84C0DFE3013190D168A86D17958E.description: Explain the importance of effective dental and personal hygiene practices.

F8AF3400DFE3013190D068A86D17958E.description: Essential Concepts - All students will comprehend essential concepts related to enhancing health.
comments: Understanding essential concepts about the relationships between behavior and health provides the foundation for making informed decisions about health-related behaviors and for selecting appropriate health products and services.

F8AE9EC0DFE3013190CE68A86D17958E.description: Encourage others to practice safe behaviors in the classroom and on the playground.

F8AE5980DFE3013190CD68A86D17958E.description: Health Promotion - All students will demonstrate the ability to promote and support personal, family, and community health.
comments: Personal, family, and community health are interdependent and mutually supporting. The ability to promote the health of oneself and others reflects a well-rounded development and expression of health.

F8AE0650DFE3013190CC68A86D17958E.description: Explain appropriate protective gear and equipment.

F8ADBFB0DFE3013190CB68A86D17958E.description: Practice emergency, fire, and safety plans at home and at school.

F8AD7D10DFE3013190CA68A86D17958E.description: Practice ways to stay safe at home, at school, and in the community.

F8AD2E60DFE3013190C968A86D17958E.description: Practicing Health-Enhancing Behaviors - All students will demonstrate the ability to practice behaviors that reduce risk and promote health.
comments: Practicing healthy behaviors builds competence and confidence to use learned skills in real-life situations. The ability to adopt health-enhancing behaviors demonstrates students' ability to use knowledge and skills to manage health and reduce risk-taking behaviors.

F8ACEAE0DFE3013190C868A86D17958E.description: Analyze why wearing a helmet when biking, skateboarding, or in-line skating increases safety.

F8ACABF0DFE3013190C768A86D17958E.description: Assess reasons for reporting weapons possession.

F8AC6BA0DFE3013190C668A86D17958E.description: Identify the benefits of using nonviolent means to resolve conflicts.

F8AC2A90DFE3013190C568A86D17958E.description: Analyze steps to take in emergency or potentially dangerous situations.

F8ABE600DFE3013190C468A86D17958E.description: Decision Making - All students will demonstrate the ability to use decision-making skills to enhance health.
comments: Managing health behaviors requires critical thinking and problem solving. The ability to use decision-making skills to guide health behaviors fosters a sense of control and promotes the acceptance of personal responsibility.

F8AB9EA0DFE3013190C368A86D17958E.description: Identify ways to report inappropriate touching.

F8AB5070DFE3013190C268A86D17958E.description: Describe how to report dangerous situations.

F8AB0410DFE3013190C168A86D17958E.description: Interpersonal Communication - All students will demonstrate the ability to use interpersonal communication skills to enhance health.
comments: Positive relationships support the development of healthy attitudes and behaviors. The ability to appropriately convey and receive information, beliefs, and emotions is a skill that enables students to manage risk, conflict, and differences and to promote health.

F8AAB440DFE3013190C068A86D17958E.description: List people to go to for help if feeling unsafe or threatened.

F8AA6000DFE3013190BF68A86D17958E.description: Accessing Valid Information - All students will demonstrate the ability to access and analyze health information, products, and services.
comments: Students are exposed to numerous sources of information, products, and services. The ability to access and analyze health information, products, and services provides a foundation for practicing health-enhancing behaviors. Health choices are affected by a variety of influences. The ability to recognize, analyze, and evaluate internal and external influences is essential to protecting and enhancing health.

F8AA1350DFE3013190BE68A86D17958E.description: Describe internal and external influences that could lead to or prevent injury or violence.

F8A9CD40DFE3013190BD68A86D17958E.description: Analyzing Influences - All students will demonstrate the ability to analyze internal and external influences that affect health.
comments: Health choices are affected by a variety of influences. The ability to recognize, analyze, and evaluate internal and external influences is essential to protecting and enhancing health.

F8A97AE0DFE3013190BC68A86D17958E.description: Identify refusal skills when in personal-safety situations (e.g., use a clear "no" statement, walk or run away, change subject, delay).

F8A8F730DFE3013190BA68A86D17958E.description: Demonstrate proper lifting and carrying techniques for handling heavy backpacks and book bags.

F8A8AC10DFE3013190B968A86D17958E.description: Identify ways to reduce risk of injuries while traveling in an automobile or bus (e.g., wearing a safety belt).

F8A86140DFE3013190B868A86D17958E.description: Define and explain the dangers of weapons and the importance of telling a trusted adult if you see or hear about someone having a weapon.

F8A80140DFE3013190B768A86D17958E.description: Explain why the back seat is the safest place for young people to be when riding in a vehicle equipped with air bags.

F8A7B9D0DFE3013190B668A86D17958E.description: Distinguish between appropriate and inappropriate touching.

F8A77AA0DFE3013190B568A86D17958E.description: Explain the importance of telling an adult if someone is in danger or being bullied.

F8A73B10DFE3013190B468A86D17958E.description: Identify ways to reduce risk of injuries at home, at school, and in the community.

F8A6FBE0DFE3013190B368A86D17958E.description: Identify safety hazards in the home, at school, and in the community.

F8A6BAF0DFE3013190B268A86D17958E.description: Discuss the meaning of basic safety-related signs, symbols, and warning labels.

F8A67720DFE3013190B168A86D17958E.description: Identify labels of products that give information about cautions and dangers.

F8A62D70DFE3013190B068A86D17958E.description: Describe characteristics of safe and unsafe places.

F8A5E2E0DFE3013190AF68A86D17958E.description: Essential Concepts - All students will comprehend essential concepts related to enhancing health.
comments: Understanding essential concepts about the relationships between behavior and health provides the foundation for making informed decisions about health-related behaviors and for selecting appropriate health products and services.

F8A54440DFE3013190AD68A86D17958E.description: Recognize parents, guardians, and other trusted adults as resources for information about growth and development.

F8A4F240DFE3013190AC68A86D17958E.description: Accessing Valid Information - All students will demonstrate the ability to access and analyze health information, products, and services.
comments: Students are exposed to numerous sources of information, products, and services. The ability to access and analyze health information, products, and services provides a foundation for practicing health-enhancing behaviors. Health choices are affected by a variety of influences. The ability to recognize, analyze, and evaluate internal and external influences is essential to protecting and enhancing health.

F8A4ACA0DFE3013190AB68A86D17958E.description: Explain why sleep and rest are important for proper growth and good health.

F8A457E0DFE3013190AA68A86D17958E.description: Analyzing Influences - All students will demonstrate the ability to analyze internal and external influences that affect health.
comments: Health choices are affected by a variety of influences. The ability to recognize, analyze, and evaluate internal and external influences is essential to protecting and enhancing health.

F8A410B0DFE3013190A968A86D17958E.description: Describe how members of a family have various roles, responsibilities, and individual needs.

F8A3A9E0DFE3013190A868A86D17958E.description: Identify a variety of behaviors that promote healthy growth and development.

F8A34B40DFE3013190A768A86D17958E.description: Identify anatomical names of major internal and external body parts.

F8A2F830DFE3013190A668A86D17958E.description: Describe how living things grow and mature.

F89D4030DFE3013190A568A86D17958E.description: Essential Concepts - All students will comprehend essential concepts related to enhancing health.
comments: Understanding essential concepts about the relationships between behavior and health provides the foundation for making informed decisions about health-related behaviors and for selecting appropriate health products and services.
